summary: This document is an email chain from January 2021 regarding the technical process of uploading a new data set related to 'US v. Epstein' into a document review platform (Relativity). The correspondence involves coordination with a vendor to replace old 'Florida scanned data' with new data, indicating ongoing document management for the case.

events.title: Data Upload Initiated
events.description: A vendor uploads data related to 'US v. Epstein' into a ShareFile portal for review.

events.title: Data Download Confirmation
events.description: Confirmation that all data was downloaded from the vendor's FTP site, with a plan to replace old Florida scanned data in Relativity.

events.title: Data Upload Status Update
events.description: Update that the vendor has the data and is working on the upload after removing old data, with completion expected in weeks.

keyFacts: The correspondence concerns the technical management of document data for the case 'US v. Epstein'.
A vendor (Melken Solutions, LLC) is handling the upload of a new data set into the Relativity review platform.
The process involves replacing old 'Florida scanned data' with new data from the vendor.
The email chain spans from December 2020 to January 2021, showing ongoing case preparation activity.
The data is shared via a secure portal (ShareFile) due to size and confidentiality concerns.
